ABOUT THIS GAME

"Sid Meier's CivilizationÃ‚Â®: Beyond Earth Ã¢â€žÂ¢ - the new part of the famous series ,made in the category of science fiction. The game takes place in a future where global events led to the collapse of modern society and the emergence of a new world order , and left the fate of humanity in question. People are struggling for survival, and the newly formed nation focus on space missions to find a place where you can start all over again.You are part of the expedition sent by the construction of the alien houses, and write the next chapter in the development of mankind , leading his people to the new frontier in space and creating a new civilization. Explore and populate another planet , developing new technologies , collect powerful armies , build wonders of the alien world, determine the shape of the new world. Going on a trip , you need to take very important decisions . Each of your choice from the sponsor of the expedition to the composition of the colony , opens limitless opportunities.

FEATURES

Manage adventures. Create a new nation , define its cultural identity , choosing one of the eight missions , each with its own leader and its own unique features . Organizes expeditions , collecting spacecraft , cargo , and the colonists by the various decisions that depend on the initial conditions of a new planet.Colonize another planet. Find out what is dangerous and what is profitable new planet with its dangerous terrain, extraordinary resources and hostile life forms. Build outposts find relics of alien races , strange beasts tamed , create trade routes and develop great city to ensure the prosperity of his people .Spider Web technologies. To submit a progress leading to the indefinite future , the development of technologies implemented in the form of non-linear variants that influence the development of mankind. Web of technology , there are three areas , each of which correspond to their victory conditions .
Actions in orbit. Cook and commissioning of advanced military, economic and scientific satellites , which will provide you defense, attack and support from orbit.Setting gaming units. Open various improvements in the web technologies and adjust their units according to the style of play .
Multiplayer game . Compete for power in the new world can up to 8 players .
Support modifications. Players are given the ability to customize and change the game to fit your needs .
